attributes.action: instigate a police investigation into the expense claims of Baroness Uddin with a view  to bringing criminal charges of fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition is self explanatory. In any other walk of life evidence such as that brought to public attention by The Sunday Times would result in a police investigation and a probable charge of fraud.

rejection.details: The Government does not investigate criminal proceedings.  That would be a matter for the police, and where necessary the Crown Prosecution Service, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
